meanings.definition: (主に南アフリカ) ランド (南アフリカの通貨単位)
meanings.english_definition: (chiefly South Africa) rand (the basic monetary unit of South Africa)

etymology.value: Derived from the Witwatersrand, the ridge where most of South Africa's gold deposits were found.

usage_notes.explanation: 'Rond' is primarily used in South Africa to refer to the South African currency, the rand. It is not commonly used outside of South Africa.
